infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires camera access so you can take photos of your baggage for check-in and update your profile picture.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library so you can upload images of your baggage or update your profile photo.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone only if voice communication features are enabled in the future.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationAlertUsageDescription: This app sends notifications to alert you about driver updates, service confirmations, and baggage check-in progress.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationSoundUsageDescription: This app uses sound alerts to notify you of important updates from your assigned driver or service changes.
infoPlist.NSUserNotificationBadgeUsageDescription: This app displays badges to indicate pending notifications about your bookings or driver status.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location to help assign a nearby driver and manage pickup for your booked service.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app may use your location in the background to keep your driver updated while you are en route or awaiting pickup.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses your location to improve service accuracy and ensure timely baggage check-in and driver coordination.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow Flythru to use your location.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.

plugins.calendarPermission: The app needs to access your calendar.
